definition: brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

pinyin: si4 hai3 zhi1 nei4 jie1 xiong1 di4

definition: internal disunity dissolves at the threat of an invasion from outside (idiom)
pinyin: xiong1 di4 xi4 yu2 qiang2 , wai4 yu4 qi2 wu3

definition: Brothers Karamazov by Dostoevsky 陀思妥耶夫斯基[Tuo2 si1 tuo3 ye1 fu1 si1 ji1]
pinyin: Ka3 la1 ma3 zuo3 fu1 Xiong1 di4

definition: even with your own brother, keep clear accounts (idiom)
pinyin: qin1 xiong1 di4 , ming2 suan4 zhang4

sentences.english: This rule nullifies the "little brother" argument.
sentences.chinese: 这条规则否定的“小兄弟”的论点。

sentences.english: It seemed as if they derived some sort of twisted pleasure from this brotherly fighting.
sentences.chinese: 这种兄弟相残似乎使他们获得了某种扭曲的快感。

sentences.english: The ampersand (&) characters between the sibling element subpatterns indicate that any order is acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟元素子范式之间的竖线表示允许任何顺序。

sentences.english: The montgolfier brothers began experimenting by filling small paper bags with smoke.
sentences.chinese: 蒙戈尔菲耶兄弟俩最初的实验是把烟装进小纸袋。

sentences.english: Her brother is the king, but she is the effective ruler.
sentences.chinese: 她的兄弟是国王，但她才是实际的主宰者。

sentences.english: Hargett sank the ball with his brother’s 9 iron to win the prize.
sentences.chinese: 哈盖特用他兄弟的球杆挥杆进洞赢得了奖金。

sentences.english: Can a first cousin at one remove inherit the property?
sentences.chinese: 在堂表兄弟姐妹这一辈当中，他是唯一的男孩。

sentences.english: All my brothers are killing each other for the throne.
sentences.chinese: 我的兄弟们为了皇位相互杀戮。

sentences.english: You ever hear white people callin' each other honky all the time?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时辰听过白人互相等号“白鬼”吗，兄弟？

sentences.english: 'My dear cousin,I don't eat that kind of food in my house.
sentences.chinese: 我的亲爱的堂兄弟，我在我的房子里不吃那种食品。

sentences.english: And BedelL listened as she told him about her brothers and about James.
sentences.chinese: 比德尔也倾听她讲述他的兄弟和丈夫詹姆斯的事。

sentences.english: Drop everything, cross that river, help your brothers.
sentences.chinese: 丢下手上的一切，越过那条河，去帮助我们的兄弟们。

sentences.english: A. I feel we're responsible for our brothers and sisters.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，我们应该对我们的兄弟姐妹尽责。

sentences.english: The two brothers quickly came to blows during their quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 这俩兄弟互相争吵，很快就变成了拳脚相加。

sentences.english: Lehman Brothers was a symptom of a dysfunctional financial system and regulatory failure.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟是异化的金融系统和监管失败的症状。

definition: eldest brother/big brother (polite address for a man of about the same age as oneself)/gang leader/boss
as close as one's hands and feet (idiom); loving one another as brothers/deep friendship/closely attached to one another
old age/very/eldest child in a family/leader of a group/boss/captain of a boat/leader of a criminal gang
erhua variant of 鐵哥們|铁哥们[tie3 ge1 men5]
